title: weird ui overlay bug with slayer jinx skin
body: So this happened right after I use ult for first  in match. and idk what  or why [  ](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CRZOGKJUsAAc-ha.png:large)

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! 

In the future, please submit PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe). It'll help us keep better track of the issues occurring on live versus the ones occurring on PBE. 

This doesn't appear to be a skin, specific bug, but we'll take a look and see what's going on.
